name: CL_OTP_FST_LST_SCH
description: Date and time of the first and last scheduled occurrences of an order template.

columns.name: DATE_FIRST_SCHEDUL
columns.description: The first scheduled date of the order template in this record.

columns.name: TIME_FIRST_SCHEDUL
columns.description: The first scheduled time of the order template in this record.

columns.name: DATE_LAST_SCHEDULE
columns.description: The last scheduled date of the order template in this record.

columns.name: TIME_LAST_SCHEDULE
columns.description: The last scheduled time of the order template in this record.
